title: Bast: Eternity Game
description: 3-issue miniseries featuring The Sandman's Egyptian cat goddess Lady Bast! As Lady Bast's legion of followers dwindles, so does her power. But when a teenage girl named Lucy finds a statue venerating the goddess, she sparks a series of events that will change her life forever.
author: Caitl√≠n R. Kiernan
